medical_history.chief_complaint: Obtunded state with acute pancreatitis and diabetic ketoacidosis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced an obtunded state with a history of diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA). She had several sick contacts and complained of upper respiratory infection symptoms a few days prior to admission. She had not taken her insulin medication for at least 2 days. The last thing she remembers was coughing and then vomiting before being brought to the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM), history of diabetic ketoacidosis, alcohol abuse, depression, moderately severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy, hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (DM2) and hypertension. No known family history of cancer.
medical_history.social_history: History of alcohol abuse, with the last drink consumed 2 days prior to admission. Not specified if there are other lifestyle factors.
